biotools.summary: NaviKey is a tool for querying descriptive data and has been implemented as (a) a Java applet providing the contents of DELTA files (see example with the DELTA sample data files), (b) a stand-alone Java application for accessing DELTA files or PostgreSQL versions of DiversityDescriptions databases, respectively (c) a module ("plug-in") of the Java-based Diversity Navigator database client for accessing DELTA files or PostgreSQL versions of DiversityDescriptions databases, respectively.

bioschemas.name: NaviKey
